error.generic: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
error.notFound: The page you are looking for does not exist.

hero.title: Welcome to MaarifCompass
hero.subtitle: Your guide and support platform for Türkiye Maarif Vakfı alumni and students in Türkiye. Discover resources, connect with peers, and navigate your academic journey with confidence.

item1.title: Academic Guidance
item1.description: Navigate your studies with expert advice and resources.

item2.title: Career Opportunities
item2.description: Explore internships, job postings, and career development.

item3.title: Community Network
item3.description: Connect with fellow alumni and students across Türkiye.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.content: Since our inception, we have been dedicated to fostering a supportive and enriching environment for TMV students and alumni. We're proud of the community we're building together.

getInvolved.title: Get Involved
getInvolved.content: Join our community, access valuable resources, or contribute to our mission. We're here to help you succeed.

aboutPage.mainHeading: Learn more about our mission, vision, and the services we offer to the Maarif community.
aboutPage.introduction: MaarifCompass is dedicated to supporting Türkiye Maarif Vakfı (TMV) alumni and current students pursuing their education in Türkiye. We aim to provide a comprehensive platform for guidance, resources, and community engagement to help individuals thrive academically and professionally.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To empower TMV alumni and students in Türkiye by providing accessible resources, fostering a strong community network, and offering guidance for their academic and personal development.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the leading support hub for the TMV community in Türkiye, recognized for our commitment to student success, innovation, and collaborative spirit.

whatWeOffer.title: What We Offer
whatWeOffer.item1: A centralized Document Center with academic and administrative resources.
whatWeOffer.item2: Connections to opportunities for internships, jobs, and further studies.
whatWeOffer.item3: A platform for news, events, and announcements relevant to the TMV community.

documentCenter.intro: Access important documents, forms, and resources provided by MaarifCompass. Find what you need to support your academic and administrative tasks.
documentCenter.noDocuments: No documents are currently available in the Document Center.
documentCenter.adminInstructions: Please check back later, or if you are an administrator, you can add documents through the admin panel.
documentCenter.noDescription: No description available for this document.

compassIA.title: Meet CompassIA!
compassIA.description: Have questions about our documents or need help finding specific information? Our AI Assistant, CompassIA, is here to help you navigate our resources.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about MaarifCompass, our services, and how we support our community.

haberler.description: Stay updated with the latest news and developments from MaarifCompass and the wider TMV community.
haberler.noNews: No news articles are currently available. Please check back later.

news1.title: MaarifCompass Launches New Mentorship Program
news1.summary: We are excited to announce the launch of our new mentorship program connecting senior students and alumni with newcomers.

news2.title: Annual TMV Alumni Meetup Scheduled for Next Month
news2.summary: Join us for our annual alumni meetup! A great opportunity to network and reconnect with peers.

etkinlikler.description: Discover upcoming events, workshops, and seminars organized by MaarifCompass and partner institutions.
etkinlikler.noEvents: There are no upcoming events scheduled at this time. Please check back soon.

event1.title: Workshop: Navigating Academic Research in Türkiye
event1.summary: A hands-on workshop designed to equip students with essential research skills for their studies in Turkish universities.

event2.title: Career Fair for TMV Students and Alumni
event2.summary: Explore career opportunities with leading companies and organizations at our annual career fair.

duyurular.description: Important announcements and updates from MaarifCompass. Keep informed about deadlines, new services, and more.
duyurular.noAnnouncements: There are no announcements at this moment. Please check back later for updates.

announcement1.title: Scholarship Application Deadline Approaching
announcement1.detail: The deadline for the TMF Scholarship for the upcoming academic year is on November 15th. Ensure your application is submitted on time.

announcement2.title: New Document Uploaded: Visa Renewal Guide
announcement2.detail: An updated guide for visa renewal procedures has been added to the Document Center. Please review it for the latest information.

opportunities.description: Explore various opportunities including internships, job vacancies, scholarships, and exchange programs available to TMV students and alumni.
opportunities.noOpportunities: No opportunities are listed at the moment. Please check back soon for new listings.

opportunity1.title: Internship Opportunity at Tech Solutions Inc.
opportunity1.detail: Tech Solutions Inc. is looking for motivated software engineering interns. Apply now to gain valuable industry experience.

opportunity2.title: Fully Funded PhD Scholarship in Social Sciences
opportunity2.detail: A prestigious university is offering a fully funded PhD scholarship in various social science disciplines. Deadline approaching.

aiAssistant.description: Your personal AI assistant to help you find information, answer questions about documents, and guide you through MaarifCompass resources.
aiAssistant.welcomeSubtitle: How can I assist you today?
aiAssistant.welcomeMessageCleared: Chat cleared. How can I help you now, {{name}}?
aiAssistant.errorResponse: I'm sorry, I encountered an issue while trying to respond. Please try again or ask something different.
aiAssistant.signInRequiredMessage: To use the AI Assistant, please sign in with your Google account. This helps us personalize your experience and provide better support.
aiAssistant.disclaimer: CompassIA is an AI Assistant designed to provide helpful responses from the MaarifCompass.org based on available data. It may not always have the latest information or be able to answer every question. For critical issues, please refer to official sources or contact support.

documentViewPage.downloadHint: Click the button to download the document to your device.
documentViewPage.previewNotAvailable: Preview not available for this file type.
documentViewPage.downloadToView: Please download the file to view its content.

indexingTrigger.sectionDescription: This triggers the AI document indexing flow. It reads documents from Firestore, extracts text, creates embeddings, and stores them for AI search. This may take a few minutes depending on the number and size of documents.
indexingTrigger.sectionNote: Note: This process can be resource-intensive. Use for testing purposes. Check server logs for detailed progress and errors.
indexingTrigger.noDocumentsInFirestore: No documents found in Firestore to index.

common.contentComingSoon: Content for this section is coming soon. Please check back later!
